node.title: Hours before she died, this mum was 'calm in the fact' her killer 'need not be a part' of her life
node.alt: An older man with wavy, white hair.
node.description: Trefor Kingdon, 65, has pleaded guilty to stabbing his childhood sweetheart Mandy Melzer-Head to death at their remote rural home. On the night she died, the court heard, she texted him to say their relationship was over.
node.content:
["A 65-year-old man who stabbed his partner 11 times following an argument over their separation has\u00a0pleaded guilty to\u00a0murder.", "Mandy Melzer-Head and Trefor Kingdon\u00a0were childhood sweethearts\u00a0who reconnected\u00a0at a school reunion before moving to the Mornington Peninsula.", "They\u00a0then moved to a 20-acre hobby farm in\u00a0Bendoc, in the state's remote north-east.", "On May 12, 2020, texts sent by Ms Melzer-Head indicated the relationship was over.", "\"Not sad, not drunk, not enraged,\" she wrote.", "", "
Mandy Melzer-Head was remembered by her daughters and cousin as the light of their lives.(Facebook)
", "The Victorian Supreme Court heard both had been drinking \u2014\u00a0Ms Melzer-Head's\u00a0blood alcohol content was 0.14 and\u00a0Kingdon admitted to having six drinks.", "Three hours later that night, Ms Melzer-Head called Kingdon nine times\u00a0before he returned to the kitchen, grabbed a 32-centimetre kitchen knife and stabbed her.", "A friend staying with the pair, John Osborne, woke up to Kingdon telling him \"I think I've killed Mandy\".", "Mr Osborne called triple-0 and tried CPR for two hours but could not revive Ms Melzer-Head.", "In questioning Kingdon's \"disproportionate response\" today, Justice Lex Lasry questioned the normalisation of men's violence against women.", "", "
Bendoc is more than six hours\u00a0east of\u00a0Melbourne, making it one of Victoria's most isolated towns.(ABC Gippsland: Emma Field)
", "
'Burdened with darkness'
", "Both of Ms Melzer-Head's daughters had returned from careers overseas to grieve for their mother and organise her estate.", "Her youngest daughter, Alexandra Head, told the court she had come back from Cambodia where she had been\u00a0working in a gender equality development program.", "\"The day after Mother's Day, you took my mum,\" she said.", "\"You have burdened me with darkness.\"", "Ms Head said she was considering changing her career due to severe post-traumatic stress caused by her mother's death.", "Eldest daughter Georgia Head told the court\u00a0her mum\u00a0was \"desperate to be a grandmother\".\u00a0", "\"I miss you with all that I have,\" she said.", "
'Genuine empathy'
", "Kingdon's defence argued several factors should be considered to reduce his sentence.", "A psychologist's report found Kingdon had a \"genuine empathy\" for the trauma he had caused.\u00a0", "The defence also implored Justice Lasry to consider his age in the sentencing and the early stage of his guilty plea.\u00a0", "Kingdon is expected to be sentenced in coming weeks."]
